result.execSummary:
The defendant Austin A. Vera Hernandez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant to pay fine, costs and DNA surcharge within 60 days (4/22/16) through the Dodge County Clerk of Courts office or set up a payment plan within said time.
Defendant shall submit a DNA sample and pay surcharge.
Upon payment in full of all financial obligations, the record may be expunged.

records.addlTxt: No appearances. Court orders debt turned over to State Debt Collections.
Payment hearing on July 18, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Austin A. Vera Hernandez in court with attorney Jessica Marie Moeller. Gilbert Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Def. will plead today; Court reviews GPQPA & WOR; Court reviews recomm.; Court reviews charge/penalties; victim rights complied with; Def. pleads Guilty to DC in Count 1; Court finds plea made FV&I and finds Def. guilty of DC in Count 1 w/Count 2 D&RI; State heard; Atty. Moeller heard; Court imposes sentence

* $100 F+C = $379.00 or 20 days in jail
* $200 DNA surcharge and sample
* Expungement upon payment in full

Defendant shall not have any violent or abusive contact with anyone.  Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.

9:17 - Defendant Austin A. Vera Hernandez in court with attorney Jaclyn R. Shelton (eligible - not yet appointed).  Gilbert Grant Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges and penalties. Court finds probable cause. Court enters Not Guilty plea. New address: 1201 River Rd #93, Sparta WI 54656. RD & JT set. Court sets $500 PA bond with conditions:   Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.  Defendant shall not have any violent or abusive contact with anyone.  Return date scheduled for February 22, 2016 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for April 6, 2016 at 08:30 am.
